headline: Public Affairs, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement
summary: Specialties: Communications, public relations, campaigns & governmental affairs.

positions.description: Senior adviser and primary on-the-record spokeswoman for a high-profile Senator, providing expertise on communications and policy strategy while leading a team of three. Collaborate closely with policy team to effectively highlight the Senator's legislative priorities and achievements, expanding her national profile on national security and commerce issues. Prepare the senator for dozens of major national interviews, including Sunday public affairs programs. Develop and place opinion pieces in local and national publications, draft speeches for major policy addresses and political events.
positions.title: Communications Director

positions.description: Chief spokeswoman and senior communications strategist for a top-tier, nationally targeted Senate reelection campaign during a historically challenging election cycle. Developed an integrated earned and social media strategy to advance the campaign's core messages, designed and executed message-driven events, and prepared the senator for all debates, editorial boards, and major national interviews. Managed complex crisis communications situations and directed an aggressive rapid response operation to defend the candidate's brand and record.
positions.title: Communications Director

positions.description: Helped establish press office for a dynamic freshman senator with positions on the Armed Services, Commerce, Homeland Security, Budget, and Small Business Committees. Helped plan public appearances to highlight legislative accomplishments, led targeted media outreach to key opinion makers and journalists, prepared the Senator for national and local media events, pitched and booked national and local television and radio appearances, drafted written materials, and expanded the Senator's social media following.
positions.title: Press Secretary

positions.description: Spokeswoman for Maine's junior U.S. Senator with a leadership role on the Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee. Drafted press releases, columns, op-eds, speeches, and e-newsletter content, managed the Senator's social media presence, pitched interviews with local and national media, staffed the Senator for public events and interviews in DC and Maine.
positions.title: Deputy Press Secretary

positions.description: Assisted the Chief of Staff and Senator with a broad range of special projects that supported essential office operations, including: coordinating the internship program, editing all constituent correspondence, and overseeing official events for the Senator.
positions.title: Executive Assistant to the Chief of Staff

positions.description: Assisted with a variety of projects and supportive roles on a competitive Senate campaign that resulted in the largest Republican Senate victory of the 2008 cycle. Tracked all media buys, assisted with fundraisers and financial reports, staffed campaign events, advanced travel and coordinated logistics, and planned all Election Day events.
positions.title: Assistant to the Campaign Manager
